snippet: KAGAN--Grace M.,94, passed peacefully at home in Palm Beach Gardens, FL on May 27, 2016 with daughter Barbra by her side. Beloved wife of Lou who predeceased her, treasured mother, sister and devoted friend to many. Always vivacious and elegant she showed a passion for life until her last hours. Her wisdom, strength and unwavering love was a daily inspiration to her heartbroken daughter. In lieu of flowers, please consider a donation to Hospice of Palm Beach Counties. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  KAGAN, GRACE M.
